title: An Act relative to investments by entities of the Commonwealth

abstracts.abstract: By Mr. DiDomenico, a petition (accompanied by bill, Senate, No. 721) of Sal N. DiDomenico for legislation relative to investments by entities of the Commonwealth.  Financial Services.
